welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kavlinge, Sweden's charming and picturesque city known for its beautiful parks and historic buildings. We hope you have a lovely stay and take some time to explore and experience all that Kavlinge has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ljungbyhed Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ljungbyhed Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sturup Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kastrup Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Kastrup Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.
